title: Fragment
medium:
Medium: Warp; S-spun wool. Wefts; S-spun wool, S 2 or 3 Z plied wool. 
Technique: Weft-faced plain weave (13/cm x 38/cm) and slit tapestry and supplementary wefts.
description: Light design on dark ground. Probably was a part of a clavus.  A purple band with wave crest borders enclosing rows of alternating quadruped animals and floral images.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment.Medium: Warp; S-spun wool. Wefts; S-spun wool, S 2 or 3 Z plied wool. 
Technique: Weft-faced plain weave (13/cm x 38/cm) and slit tapestry and supplementary wefts.. 1960-56-6.
